body:
Comment 11: 
The mention of signed vs. unsigned reminds me of the error displayed while installing
minecraft:

http://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/901687-error-minecraft-is-damaged

The interesting bit is the very unhelpful error (""Minecraft" is damaged and can't be
opened. You should move it to the trash") and that the behaviour is controlled by a
setting (System Preferences => Security & Privacy).

I'm not a mac owner so I cannot verify this, but maybe the other commenters have their
installation source set to "Anywhere"?
